description: Number of partitions of n into parts not of the form 15k, 15k+7 or 15k-7. Also number of partitions with at most 6 parts of size 1 and differences between parts at distance 6 are greater than 1.
references: G. E. Andrews, The Theory of Partitions, Addison-Wesley, 1976, p. 109.
